row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.DELETE_DEPLOYMENT
row.description: Provide information about the Deployment to be deleted from Azure

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Delete a Deployment in Azure"><properties><entry name="text">Delete a Deployment in Azure</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#

<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Cloud Service Name" tooltip="Cloud Service name in which your Deployment is located. row.name: UC4RB_AZR_DELETE_BY_SLOT#
